section.heading: Power to develop, construct and maintain facilities.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 8 (f) of the Recreation Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-20, February 28, 1995, 42 DCR 1175).
For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 2082(j) of Fiscal Year 2010 Budget Support Second Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207, October 15, 2009, 56 DCR 8234).
For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 2082(j) of Fiscal Year Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-260, January 4, 2010, 57 DCR 345).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Construction of Law 10-152: See note to § 3-1401.
